    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Evaporation of a liquid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung einer Flüssigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaporation d'un liquide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evaporação de um líquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Evaporazione di un liquido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάτμιση ενός υγρού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaporación de un líquido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a liquid evaporates, fast-moving molecules with the most energy leaves its surface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn eine 
Flüssigkeit verdunstet, sich schnell bewegende Moleküle mit der 
meisten Energie seine Oberfläche verläßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un liquide
s'évapore, les molécules rapides avec de la plupart de l'énergie 
part de sa surface.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um 
líquido evapora, as moléculas fast-moving com a maioria de energia 
saem de sua superfície.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un 
liquido si volatilizza, le molecole rapide con la maggior parte della 
energia lascia la relativa superficie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν εξατμίζει 
ένα υγρό, τα γρήγορα μόρια με την περισσότερη ενέργεια αφήνουν 
την επιφάνειά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un 
líquido se evapora, las moléculas rápidas con la mayoría de la 
energía salen de su superficie.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
